short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring back last seen and profile views from stackexchange sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Recently there was a UI change in StackOverflow and StackExchange sites and sections like profile views and last seen of users were lost. For those users who want to again see the last seen and profile views section, this extension helps by fetching the data from the public API provided by StackOverflow Network and displaying that info in the profile section of the user.
